EmailTemplate.description: EOY 2016 Expert Email - sent to Leads
EmailTemplate.name: 10K Expert/Leads - EOY 2016
EmailTemplate.subject: Happy New Year from 10K!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Lead.FirstName},
2017 is fast approaching and I wanted to make sure I said "Thank you!" before the year is over. Thank you for your interest in the 10K Community. We are very excited for all that we can accomplish together in 2017!
There will be many positive changes coming your way in 2017. We will be launching a new website, improving the 10K Community, and adding more opportunities for learning and collaboration.
Our 10K Experts are the best of the best and we are looking forward to growing our community in 2017!
Happy New Year,
From the 10K Advisor's Team
